sentences.en: All attempts to bolster up apartheid are bound to fail.
sentences.cn: 一切想维护种族隔离的企图都是注定要失败的.

sentences.en: An incident did happen to bolster up and warm her heart.
sentences.cn: 有一件事曾那样震撼、温暖着她的心.

sentences.en: At the federal level, several bills would bolster the states'efforts.
sentences.cn: 在联邦这方面, 议案将会促使众州再接再厉.

sentences.en: Beside the window the enormous bed was made up, with ragged blankets and a coverless bolster.
sentences.cn: 窗户旁边那张硕大无朋的床已经整理完毕, 铺了破旧的毛毯,还有个没遮盖的长枕头.

sentences.en: He is making a bold attempt to bolster the territory’s confidence.
sentences.cn: 他正在采取大胆行动以提振辖区信心。

sentences.en: He tried to bolster up their morale.
sentences.cn: 他尽力鼓舞他们的士气.

sentences.en: his efforts to bolster his career
sentences.cn: 他为发展事业所付出的努力

sentences.en: His re-creation of the city is credible, with a substratum of fact to bolster the fiction.
sentences.cn: 他对该城历史的再现是可信的，虚构的小说情节隐念着一些事实作为支撑。

sentences.en: I need some more examples to bolster up my theory.
sentences.cn: 我还需要几个实例来证实我的理论.

sentences.en: I'll bolster you up.
sentences.cn: 我支持你。

sentences.en: If you have a bolster or several pillows, place your lower back onto the support.
sentences.cn: 如果你有一个支撑或者一些枕头，将你的下半身靠在这些支撑上。

sentences.en: It must now take further action to bolster consumer spending.
sentences.cn: 目前他们必须采取进一步行动,以支撑消费者的消费行为.

sentences.en: More timbers are needed to bolster the roof of the mine.
sentences.cn: 需要更多的木材支撑矿顶.

sentences.en: Pillars bolster the roof.
sentences.cn: 柱子支撑屋顶.

sentences.en: Staying friendly with those under you can help bolster your career.
sentences.cn: 对下级友好一些有助于促进您的职业生涯.

sentences.en: The ECB also preparing more steps to bolster the euro - zone banking sector.
sentences.cn: 欧洲央行还准备采取更多举措来提振欧元区银行业.

sentences.en: The endurance, however, is sure to bolster him to probe so as to be"better".
sentences.cn: 但是，人的忍耐力必将支撑着人坚实地向前探索，使人变得“更好”。

sentences.en: The high interest rates helped to bolster up the economy.
sentences.cn: 高利率使经济更稳健.

sentences.en: The woman took some gin to bolster up her courage.
sentences.cn: 那名妇女喝些杜松子酒壮胆.

sentences.en: Working to bolster one will help you strengthen many others.
sentences.cn: 改善了这方面的个性也将有助于其他个性的改善.

sentences.en: Yesterday's results will also bolster calls for more children to study science and maths A-levels – which are typically needed to take an engineering degree.
sentences.cn: 昨日的结果也支持让更多的孩子学习科学和A级数学的呼吁，因为这些学科对于学习工程学是非常必要的。

phrases.tran_cn: 护索板；支承板；压床垫板

trans.tran_cn: （垫在普通枕头下的）长枕，垫枕
trans.tran_en: a long firm  pillow  , usually shaped like a tube
